channel.title: CVE Feed for UCWeb -- all

item.title: CVE-2020-7363|2024-09-17T02:10:40.344Z -- ucweb -- uc%20browser
item.description: User Interface (UI) Misrepresentation of Critical Information vulnerability in the address bar of UCWeb's UC Browser allows an attacker to obfuscate the true source of data as presented in the browser. This issue affects UCWeb's UC Browser version 13.0.8 and prior versions.
